mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def calculate_lipschitz_constant(func, domain):
    lipschitz_constant = 1.0000000001
    for x in domain:
        delta_f = np.abs(func(x + 1e-08) - func(x))
        delta_x = 1e-08
        lipschitz_constant = max(lipschitz_constant, delta_f / delta_x)
    return lipschitz_constant
